messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Re: MISSING EMAIL...
messages.msgSnippet: HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA... What would life be like without you se grouse blokes.  I also emailed my ISP and this morning I got 20 emails, the most in two weeks, so I
messages.messageBody:
HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA...

What would life be like without you'se grouse blokes. I also emailed my ISP and
this morning I got 20 emails, the most in two weeks, so I do wonder if my ISP
wasn't blocking yahoo mail...

Bestests,

Barry Tee.

Milt, hmmm, an ashigaru eh!! That I'd like to see...

----- Original Message -----
From: "bungotakadasword" <MuramasaIII@...>
To: <nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, March 31, 2006 2:28 AM
Subject: [nihontostudy] Re: MISSING EMAIL...


--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, "John Berta" <johnberta@...> wrote:
>
> Hi Barry;
>
> Milt has been editing your email.
>
> He told us not to write to you.

> John

hans,
I can't do that here...........I am just an ashigaru on this list.

milt

messages.messageBody:

Now back to business, I will check Barry's account and see if I can see
anything wrong there.

Rich

Best regards,

Barry Thomas
(Melbourne, Australia)
